info.name: InterviewAI - AI Avatar Service
info.description:
API collection for testing the InterviewAI AI Avatar backend service.

## Features
- Health check endpoints
- Interview info and avatar status
- WebSocket-based interview sessions
- D-ID avatar video generation

## Setup
1. Set the `base_url` variable to your deployment URL
2. Set `DID_API_KEY` if testing avatar status

request.description: Check if the service is running and healthy.
Get D-ID avatar service status and remaining credits.

response.name: Not Configured

request.description: Get information about the interview format, including total questions, types, and avatar configuration.
Get list of available TTS voices for the avatar.

WebSocket endpoint for interview sessions.

## Protocol

### 1. Connect
Connect to `ws://host/api/v1/interview/session`

### 2. Receive Session Info
```json
{
  "type": "session_info",
  "data": {
    "session_id": "session_xxx",
    "state": "created",
    "total_questions": 10,
    "avatar_mode": "video",
    "avatar_image_url": "https://..."
  }
}
```

### 3. Start Interview
Send:
```json
{"type": "start"}
```

### 4. Receive Question
```json
{
  "type": "question",
  "data": {
    "question_id": 1,
    "question_text": "Tell me about yourself...",
    "question_type": "introduction",
    "avatar_mode": "video",
    "video_url": "https://d-id-clips-prod.s3...",
    "idle_video_url": "https://clips-presenters.d-id.com/...",
    "audio_base64": "...",
    "audio_duration": 10.5,
    "current_question": 1,
    "total_questions": 10,
    "latency_ms": 45000
  }
}
```

### 5. Send Answer
```json
{
  "type": "answer",
  "data": {
    "question_id": 1,
    "answer_text": "My name is..."
  }
}
```

### 6. Repeat until Complete
```json
{
  "type": "complete",
  "data": {
    "message": "Interview completed!",
    "questions_answered": 10
  }
}
```

### 7. End Session (optional)
Send:
```json
{"type": "end"}
```
